about_the_game:
Survive in this horror/puzzle adventure. Try to stay alive and fight the vengeful deer monster that lives in the forest. Use your camera to flash the monster and escape. Explore the forest and find out what happened.

Explore The Forest

You decided to take a vacation on the relaxing forest... but you didn't expect it to be cursed. You must explore the woods and uncover the truth.

The Deer Head

A scary deer-headed demon lives in the forest and it will kill you if you are not careful enough. Who is it...?

The Camera

No weapons, just you and your camera. Use your camera to protect yourself from the monster and use it to see in the dark. Watch out for the battery!

name: Deer Head

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Core i3 6100
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 730
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
